BaseMemÂ¶

struct asmjit::BaseMem
#include <defs.h>

Base class for all memory operands.

Public Functions

BaseMem()

BaseMem(const BaseMem & other)

BaseMem(const _NoInit &)

BaseMem clone()

Clone BaseMem operand.

void reset()

Reset BaseMem operand.

uint32_t getMemType()

Get the type of the memory operand, see kMemType.

bool isBaseIndexType()

Get whether the type of the memory operand is either kMemTypeBaseIndex or kMemTypeStackIndex.

bool hasBase()

Get whether the memory operand has base register.

uint32_t getBase()

Get memory operand base id, or kInvalidValue.

BaseMem & setSize(uint32_t size)

Set memory operand size.

int32_t getDisplacement()

Get memory operand relative displacement.

BaseMem & setDisplacement(int32_t disp)

Set memory operand relative displacement.

BaseMem & operator=(const BaseMem & other)

bool operator==(const BaseMem & other)

bool operator!=(const BaseMem & other)
